title: Door and Window seals / rubbers .... now updated with prices

posts.content:
Various door and window seals available.

For pics and prices, check out this link;

http://www.thesamba.com/vw/classifieds/ ... me=Jonesy&

SSVC forum users will get discounts on multiple item purchases - PM me for a price on what you need.

I have more to add, so if you don't see what you need just ask.

Cheers,
Jonesy

Cool mate, PM me or email boatyardbuses@aol.com with your list

I need EVERYTHING, any chance you would have enough for a complete seal kit, or just as many as you've got and a price please? 64 split, fixed front screens, large window tailgate, 6x pop outs..


cheers
Doug

Total = £342 delivered.

Thanks for the list. How limited is stock? theres a couple of items i wouldnt need, forgot them, the fish eye seals and engine lid but otherwise all the rest. from looking dow that seems like most of the seals etc anyway..?

No worries, stock is fairly limited.

Just take off what you don't need and i'll still post for free
hi jonesy, after a full set of rubbers/felts for both my cab doors, do you have these, how much? cheers
